definition: letter/symbol/character/word/CL:個|个[ge4]/courtesy or style name traditionally given to males aged 20 in dynastic China
sentence/clause/phrase/classifier for phrases or lines of verse

sentences.english: This paper mainly discusses the comparative sentence "Fang" of mediaeval Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究的是中古汉语表示比较的方字句。

sentences.english: The words flowed unbidden from my pen.
sentences.chinese: 这些字句从我的笔端滚滚流出。

sentences.english: This article discusses the weak condition of the ba-sentences in Cantonese .
sentences.chinese: 文章主要讨论粤语中的“把”字句的弱位状态。

sentences.english: Wow, how can these words appear in temple?
sentences.chinese: 哇，庙里怎么会出现这样的字句呢？

sentences.english: And the song, from beginning to end, I found again in the heart of a friend.
sentences.chinese: 还有那支歌，我也找见，字字句句记在朋友的心间。

sentences.english: The fourth chapter mainly analyse Modern Chinese "Jiao"sentence from the pragmatic level.
sentences.chinese: 第四章主要从语用层面分析了“叫”字句。

sentences.english: as you read and turn the thin message in your hands.
sentences.chinese: 阅读信上的字句，一张薄纸在手中翻来覆去。

sentences.english: The Chinese subtitle, however, mistranslated her remarks such that the endorsement was removed.
sentences.chinese: 中文字幕却错译，删去她认同的字句。

sentences.english: The radio had been turned so bound that no one would miss a word .
sentences.chinese: 收音机的音量被调得很大，没有人会听漏一个字句。

sentences.english: The pragmatic value of Ba-sentences is different from that of common SVO sentences.
sentences.chinese: “把”字句与一般的SVO句语用价值不同。

sentences.english: Dayan flying into heading Hemiao stretch into words.
sentences.chinese: 大雁翱翔成标题，禾苗舒展成字句。

sentences.english: "The Analects" words precise and appropriate, can serve as a literary books to read.
sentences.chinese: 《论语》字句精当，也可当做文学书籍来读。

sentences.english: She drank in every word of the principal's lecture.
sentences.chinese: 她全神贯注地听校长演讲的字字句句。

sentences.english: Every word and phrase that drops from his pen is elegant.
sentences.chinese: 他笔下写出来的字字句句都是好文章。

sentences.english: Experts are collating and annotating difficult sentences in The Romance of West Chamber.
sentences.chinese: 专家们在校注《西厢记》中比较难懂的字句。

sentences.english: Those words were exscinded from the text.
sentences.chinese: 那些字句被人从文中删去了。

definition: pausing at the end of a phrase or sentence (in former times, before punctuation marks were used)/punctuation/periods and commas/sentences and phrases
literal/word by word and phrase by phrase
variant of 言辭|言辞[yan2 ci2]
